text_block_list.text: This is an announcement from the Dorowa executive committee! We're posting the schedule for the special lessons on the bulletin boards, so if you're interested, check it out!
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Oh, thank goodness! This is my first time joining Dorowa, y'know. Hey, Chiyo-chan, you gonna take the lessons too?
text_block_list.name: Chiyono O's Friend A

text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, I'm…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Surely you're fine without 'em! I was secretly watching your private lesson with Ardan-senpai earlier! ♪ You two are lookin' super great!
text_block_list.name: Chiyono O's Friend B

text_block_list.text: O-Oh, thanks. But…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I'm only good at dancing "ordinarily". I'll never be able to surpass McQueen and the others like this.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: My style of dance focuses on the basics. But their dance has choreography I've never even seen before.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: From their steps, to their fingertips, even their expressions… the passion in their dance was overflowing, enough that I had my breath taken away.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I'm just "ordinary", so what do I have that I can win with? If I want to win…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: I have to become "special" enough to not lose to anyone.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (I can't just stay as I am. Compared to McQueen and Teio, I'm sorely lacking in any kind of appeal.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (First, I have to close this gap… the gap between ordinary and special. I'm going to stand in the same ring! Like, for my solo part, if I could just do it like Maruzen-san…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (If I could dance like Maruzen-san did… I'd be a little closer to being "special"…!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Got it, got it. Seeya, Turbo… hm? You're heading home late too, Chiyono O-san?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Yeah. I was just in the studio. Y'know, practicing by myself.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Wow… don't push yourself too hard, though. Don't you think you'll worry Ardan-san like that?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Ah, don't worry, I've been making sure she won't find out. Because…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: It's one of those things that'll work itself out if I just keep on trying! Anyway, good night!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …Wonder if she's gonna be okay.
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Hah… hah…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: If I'm gonna win against those two, I have to be even more like Maruzen-san…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Ardan-san! You're attending this year's Dorowa, yes? I heard you've been working hard with your date for the couple dance.
text_block_list.name: Ardan's Classmate

text_block_list.text: I'm a big fan of your dancing! I'm absolutely positive you could win Best Date no matter who you're paired with!
text_block_list.name: Ardan's Classmate

text_block_list.text: Indeed. I, too, believe I can aim for as much. With Chiyono O-san, of course.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (It's not just "anyone". It's precisely because it's her.)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: The day of the event is drawing near, so we should practice dancing in our outfits to get used to them.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Good idea. We've got to think about the real thing… Um, Ardan-san?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Would you mind taking a look at my solo part first? I've got a trick up my sleeve to win the title of Best Date!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Your solo part, you say? Well, I don't mind, but…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: I think it'll really amaze you, Ardan-san! With this, I think I'll really be able to show off the "special" side of me!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: And at the end, I twirl like… this!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (…I did it! I really, really did it! Now I'll be "special" for sure–—)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …That was…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: What do you think, Ardan-san? I've been practicing other dance moves for my solo part, too!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …I see. But don't you think it's about time we practice the part where we dance together? We're already in our matching outfits, after all.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: O-Oh yeah, you're right. Okay, let's get back to practicing together.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …Huh?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Is something the matter?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Um, I feel like the rhythm of our couple dance is kind of off… like it's gotten slower since the last time we did it.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: No, nothing has changed. I'm still going by exactly the same rhythm.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: A-Ah, I see! Sorry about that. Okay, let's try one more time.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Chiyono O-san, I think your steps may be a tad… fast.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Huh?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (Why… is this happening? I should be dancing just like I was before, but…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (We're not in sync at all.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (What do I do here? Um… oh, that's it! If it were Maruzen-san, she'd take the lead from Ardan-san after this…)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Allow me to take the lead.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Wha— Ardan-san?! Hold on a second, I'm supposed to—
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: No. I won't concede.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: But I'm—!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (T-This is all wrong. I can't dance like Maruzen-san like this. I'm gonna go back to just being "ordinary"!)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …gh!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Chiyono O-san?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Are your legs alright?! You aren't hurt anywhere, are you?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …gh, I'm… o… kay… I-I'm sorry! I just lost my balance!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …No, it's I who should apologise. I'm the one who was taking the lead, but I made you…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Let's end practice here for today. Just in case, please do visit the infirmary… We'll continue again from tomorrow onwards.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
